modName: Cutting Room Floor - No Snow Under the Roof
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=4]
For users of Cutting Room Floor by [color=#ff0000][size=5][b]Arthmoor[/b][/size][/color] and No Snow Under the Roof by [color=#ff0000][size=5][b]Prometheus[/b][/size][/color][/size][/center][center]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Zffu6ev.gif[/img]

[color=#ff0000][size=6][color=#ff0000][size=6]REQUIREMENTS[/size][/color][/size][/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/47327/?]Cutting Room Floor[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51188/?]No Snow Under the Roof[/url]

[color=#ff0000][size=4]Load Order[/size][/color]
Place "No Snow Under The Roof - CRF Patch.esp" AFTER "Cutting Room Floor.esp"


If you're a user of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61035/?]JK's Skyrim[/url] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62223/?][/url]you might need this.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62120/?][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62223/?]JK's Skyrim - No Snow Under the Roof[/url][/center]
author: SkyrimFantom

files.name: Cutting Room Floor - No Snow Under the Roof Patch
files.fileName: Cutting Room Floor - No Snow Under the Roof Patch-62120-1-5.rar
files.changelogHtml:
1.5
- Fixed missing entries by CRF.
- Made it fully compatible with "Cutting Room Floor - Lighting Overhaul" 75469.

1.4
- Fixed a missing entry.

1.3
- Patch updated to the latest version 2.0.2 of Cutting Room Floor.

1.2
- Removed Dawnguard, Dragonborn, Unofficial Skyrim Patch from the masters requirements since this patch doesn't need them but CRF and NSUtR does.
- Changed the order of required masters in the file header what can cause errors when you use Wrye Bash. Reported by an user.

1.1
- Overwrite buildings instead of delete and adding buildings. Reason: If you'd remove Cutting Room Floor from your load order, the buildings added by this patch would be still there. Also fixed some missing entries in the records, that's why the patch is a bit larger.

1.0
- Release
